description:
Having lost his trump card, the Celestial Emperor, Jakoh is left naked and alone. Abandoned by his henchmen, he gets obliterated by a furious Falco. The joy of peace returning is short-lived, though. It is found out that Taiga of the Green Light has taken Lin and is trying to cross the Sea of Death. Ein`s life leaves a powerful impression on Kenshiro, and Kenshiro grows determined to pursue Taiga. A new battle is just beginning to unfold...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La capitale s`effondre ! Jakou le démon, va en enfer !
Teito Houkai! Jakou, Semete Jigoku de Yume o Miyo!!
The Fall of the Imperial Capital! Jakoh, You Can Dream in Hell!!
帝都崩壊! ジャコウ, せめて地獄で夢を見よ!
